schema:name: Interview Metadata
schema:description: This is a interview metadata document for further explaining the example interview presented in this folder

columns.name: Transcript file name
columns.description: The file name of respective transcript

columns.name: Interview code number
columns.description: The code numbers for formulating interviews

columns.name: Date
columns.description: The dates on which the interviews were conducted

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The location where the interviews is conducted

columns.name: Duration
columns.description: Time length of each of the interview in minutes and seconds

columns.name: Translator
columns.description: The name of the translator if applicable
